changeSet.comment: 新增工作台-节点关联表
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `vika_node_rel` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `main_node_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '主节点ID', `rel_node_id` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '关联节点ID', `extra` json DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '其他信息', `created_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建者', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='工作台-节点关联表';
